issue.title: [CF 407] Conditions not working when you have more than 2
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Configuring a icon to show Combustion out of CD when you have Pyroblast, Ignite and Living Bomb on the target.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
If I set the icon with any combination of 2 debuffs the Combustion icon shows up. If I put 3 conditions it fails.
I I have icons showing for each of the 3 debuffs, and they are working.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
r388

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Button settings:

^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SCombustion ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SUnit^Starget ^SOperator^S> ^SName^SLiving~`Bomb ^t^N2^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SUnit^Starget ^SOperator^S> ^SName^SIgnite ^t^N3^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S> ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^SPyroblast ^t^Sn^N3 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N48005^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

> Posted by CurseForge user heltonaugusto

I have no idea what is going on in these pictures. Post the export strings of the icons you showed, state if they work correctly or if they do not work correctly, and state their expected behavior if not working correctly.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I've found what was wrong. Pyroblast has two debuffs, Pyroblast (11366) and Pyroblast! (92315). The last one has an exclamation mark and is the one from procs, putind a condition with both spells worked well. Nothing wrong with the addon, perhaps you could add this exception (Pyroblast match both spells) for the uninformed mages like me =)


> Posted by CurseForge user heltonaugusto

Oh, I didn't event think about that. Adding an exception is a bit tricky, though, so I think I will just leave it be. If I put it in as an 'invisible' debuff equivalency, then it still wouldn't support multiple locales, and it would cause problems when tracking it in other icon types (cooldowns, unit cooldowns, and combat log icons especially)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
